#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <windows.h>
void imp(int matriz[27][100]);
int main(){

};

printf("\n");
char tecla;

int fil,col,f,f2,f3,f4,f5,f6,f7,f8,f9,f10,f11,f12,f13,f14,f15,f16,f17,f18,f19,f20,f21,f22,f23,f24,f25,f26,f27,f28,f29,f30,f31,f32,f33,f34,f35,f36,f37,f38,f39,c1,c2,c3,c4,c5,c6,c7,c8,c9,c10,c11,c12,c13,c14,c15,c16,c17,c18,c19,c20,c21,c22,c23,c24,c25,c26,c27,c28,c29,c30,c31,c32,c33,c34,c35,c36,c37,c38,c39,c40,c41,c42;
fil=2,col=0,f=2,c1=1,c2=2,c3=3,c4=4,c5=5,c6=6,c7=7,c8=8,c9=9,c10=10,c11=11,c12=12,c13=13,c14=14,c15=15,c16=16,c17=17,c18=18,c19=19,c20=20,c21=21,c22=22,c23=23,c24=24,c25=25,c26=26,c27=27,c28=28,c29=29,c30=30,c31=31,c32=32,c33=33,c34=34,c35=35,c36=36,c37=37,c38=38,c39=39,c40=40,c41=41,c42=42;
while(tecla!='x'){
	printf("Hora de la magia, manten presionada cualquier tecla para ver el mensaje oculto, una vez quiera avanzar presiona (x)");
	tecla=getch();
	soko[fil][col]=2;
	soko[f][c1]='H';
	soko[f][c2]='O';
	soko[f][c3]='L';
	soko[f][c4]='A';
	soko[f][c5]=' ';
	soko[f][c6]='A';
	soko[f][c7]='M';
	soko[f][c8]='I';
	soko[f][c9]='G';
	soko[f][c10]='@';
	soko[f][c11]=' ';
	soko[f][c12]='P';
	soko[f][c13]='R';
	soko[f][c14]='E';
	soko[f][c15]='S';
	soko[f][c16]='I';
	soko[f][c17]='O';
	soko[f][c18]='N';
	soko[f][c19]='A';
	soko[f][c20]=' ';
	soko[f][c21]='x';
	soko[f][c22]=' ';
	soko[f][c23]='P';
	soko[f][c24]='A';
	soko[f][c25]='R';
	soko[f][c26]='A';
	soko[f][c27]=' ';
	soko[f][c28]='I';
	soko[f][c29]='R';
	soko[f][c30]=' ';
	soko[f][c31]='A';
	soko[f][c32]=' ';
	soko[f][c33]='E';
	soko[f][c34]='L';
	soko[f][c35]=' ';
	soko[f][c36]='A';
	soko[f][c37]='L';
	soko[f][c38]='M';
	soko[f][c39]='A';
	soko[f][c40]='C';
	soko[f][c41]='E';
	soko[f][c42]='N';

imp(soko);
soko[fil][col]=167;
	soko[f][c1]=167;
	soko[f][c2]=167;
	soko[f][c3]=167;
	soko[f][c4]=167;
	soko[f][c5]=167;
	soko[f][c6]=167;
	soko[f][c7]=167;
	soko[f][c8]=167;
	soko[f][c9]=167;
	soko[f][c10]=167;
	soko[f][c11]=167;
	soko[f][c12]=167;
	soko[f][c13]=167;
	soko[f][c14]=167;
	soko[f][c15]=167;
	soko[f][c16]=167;
	soko[f][c17]=167;
	soko[f][c18]=167;
	soko[f][c19]=167;
	soko[f][c20]=167;
	soko[f][c21]=167;
	soko[f][c22]=167;
	soko[f][c23]=167;
	soko[f][c24]=167;
	soko[f][c25]=167;
	soko[f][c26]=167;
	soko[f][c27]=167;
	soko[f][c28]=167;
	soko[f][c29]=167;
	soko[f][c30]=167;
	soko[f][c31]=167;
	soko[f][c32]=167;
	soko[f][c33]=167;
	soko[f][c34]=167;
	soko[f][c35]=167;
	soko[f][c36]=167;
	soko[f][c37]=167;
	soko[f][c38]=167;
	soko[f][c39]=167;
	soko[f][c40]=167;
	soko[f][c41]=167;
	soko[f][c42]=167;
if(soko[fil][col]==167||soko[f][c1]==167||soko[f][c2]==167||soko[f][c3]==167||soko[f][c4]==167||soko[f][c5]==167||soko[f][c6]==167||soko[f][c7]==167||soko[f][c8]==167||soko[f][c9]==167||soko[f][c10]==167||soko[f][c11]==167||soko[f][c12]==167||soko[f][c13]==167||soko[f][c14]==167||soko[f][c15]==167||soko[f][c16]==167||soko[f][c17]==167||soko[f][c18]==167||soko[f][c19]==167||soko[f][c20]==167||soko[f][c21]==167||soko[f][c22]==167||soko[f][c23]==167||soko[f][c24]==167||soko[f][c25]==167||soko[f][c26]==167||soko[f][c27]==167||soko[f][c28]==167||soko[f][c29]==167||soko[f][c30]==167||soko[f][c31]==167||soko[f][c32]==167||soko[f][c33]==167||soko[f][c34]==167||soko[f][c35]==167||soko[f][c36]==167||soko[f][c37]==167||soko[f][c38]==167||soko[f][c39]==167||soko[f][c40]==167||soko[f][c41]==167||soko[f][c42]==167){
	col++,c1++,c2++,c3++,c4++,c5++,c6++,c7++,c8++,c9++,c10++,c11++,c12++,c13++,c14++,c15++,c16++,c17++,c18++,c19++,c20++,c21++,c22++,c23++,c24++,c25++,c26++,c27++,c28++,c29++,c30++,c31++,c32++,c33++,c34++,c35++,c36++,c37++,c38++,c39++,c40++,c41++,c42++;
}
if(soko[fil][col]!=167||soko[f][c1]!=167||soko[f][c2]!=167||soko[f][c3]!=167||soko[f][c4]!=167||soko[f][c5]!=167||soko[f][c6]!=167||soko[f][c7]!=167||soko[f][c8]!=167||soko[f][c9]!=167||soko[f][c10]!=167||soko[f][c11]!=167||soko[f][c12]!=167||soko[f][c13]!=167||soko[f][c14]!=167||soko[f][c15]!=167||soko[f][c16]!=167||soko[f][c17]!=167||soko[f][c18]!=167||soko[f][c19]!=167||soko[f][c20]!=167||soko[f][c21]!=167||soko[f][c22]!=167||soko[f][c23]!=167||soko[f][c24]!=167||soko[f][c25]!=167||soko[f][c26]!=167||soko[f][c27]!=167||soko[f][c28]!=167||soko[f][c29]!=167||soko[f][c30]!=167||soko[f][c31]!=167||soko[f][c32]!=167||soko[f][c33]!=167||soko[f][c34]!=167||soko[f][c35]!=167||soko[f][c36]!=167||soko[f][c37]!=167||soko[f][c38]!=167||soko[f][c39]!=167||soko[f][c40]!=167||soko[f][c41]!=167||soko[f][c42]!=167){
	col=0,c1=1,c2=2,c3=3,c4=4,c5=5,c6=6,c7=7,c8=8,c9=9,c10=10,c11=11,c12=12,c13=13,c14=14,c15=15,c16=16,c17=17,c18=18,c19=19,c20=20,c21=21,c22=22,c23=23,c24=24,c25=25,c26=26,c27=27,c28=28,c29=29,c30=30,c31=31,c32=32,c33=33,c34=34,c35=35,c36=36,c37=37,c38=38,c39=39,c40=40,c41=41,c42=42;
	fil=2,f=2;
}

    	system("cls");
 }
system("PAUSE");
}
void imp(int matriz[27][100]){
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<27;i++){
		printf("\n");
		printf("\t\t");
		for(j=0;j<100;j++){
		printf("%c",matriz[i][j]);

		}
	}
}
void  color(int c){

	HANDLE consol;
	consol = GetStdHandle
		(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
	SetConsoleTextAttribute
		(consol, c);
}
